metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14034 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in janus-gateway (aka Janus WebRTC Server) through 0.10.0. janus_get_codec_from_pt in utils.c has a Buffer Overflow via long value in an SDP Offer packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-14034` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

janus - 0.10.2-1
janus-demos - 0.10.2-1
janus-tools - 0.10.2-1
libjs-janus - 0.10.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: janus package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.2-1').
